Please_enter_a_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number
Bienvenue sur notre application de livra: Welcome to our food delivery application. By using our service, you accept the following terms and conditions
Vous acceptez de fournir des information: You agree to provide accurate information during registration.
Une_fois_confirmées_,_les_commandes_ne_p: Once confirmed, orders cannot be canceled, except in case of force majeure.
Les_restaurants_partenaires_sont_respons: Partners restaurants are responsible for the quality and availability of ordered products.
La_livraison_est_assurée_uniquement_dans: Delivery is only available in areas covered by our service.
Les_délais_de_livraison_sont_indicatifs_: Delivery times are indicative and may vary depending on local conditions (traffic, weather, etc.).
Tous_les_prix_incluent_les_taxes_applica: All prices include applicable taxes in Algeria.
Le_paiement_peut_être_effectué_en_ligne_: Payment can be made online or upon delivery (depending on available options).
Nous_ne_sommes_pas_responsables_des_reta: We are not responsible for delays, losses, or damages caused by events beyond our control.
Vous_acceptez_de_ne_pas_utiliser_l_appli: You agree not to use the application for fraudulent or illegal purposes.
Nous_nous_réservons_le_droit_de_modifier: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be informed of changes via the application.
Merci_d_utiliser_notre_service_!: Thank you for using our service!
Données_Collectées_Contenu:
- Personal information: name, surname, phone number, email address, delivery address.
- Usage data: order history, food preferences, location.
Utilisation_des_Données_Contenu:
- Process your orders.
- Improve the quality of our services.
- Send important notifications and promotional offers.
Partage_des_Données_Contenu: Your data will only be shared with the necessary parties to provide the service (partner restaurants, drivers). We do not sell your data to third parties.
Sécurité_des_Données_Contenu: We use advanced security technologies to protect your information. However, no data transmission over the Internet is completely secure.
Conservation_des_Données_Contenu: Your data is retained as long as necessary to provide the service or comply with legal obligations.
Droits_des_Utilisateurs_Contenu: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. For any request, contact us via the application or email.
Modifications_de_la_Politique_Contenu: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Any updates will be displayed in the application.
Recevez_des_notifications_sur_vos_comman: Receive notifications about your orders and special offers
Pour_une_meilleure_experience,_nous_avon: For a better experience, we need your authorization.
L_application_utilisera_votre_localisati: The application uses your location to find establishments near you, and deliver them to your address with a forecast.
service_only_in_oran: For now, our service is only available in Oran. We are working to expand soon.
